Text: RE Meeting regarding Master Netting AgreementsCount me in Rick Antonoff said he David Mitchell and another bankruptcy lawyer in their DC office would be joining us Harlan E Murphy Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith Street EB Houston Texas Tel Fax Email Harlan nroncom Original Message From Heard Marie Sent Monday October PM To Sayre Frank Shackleton Sara Gray Barbara N Koehler Anne C Hendry Brent Murphy Harlan Portz David Hodge Jeffrey T Nemec Gerald Sole III Carlos Dickson Stacy E Leite Francisco Pinto Davis Angela Cc Cook Mary Subject Meeting regarding Master Netting Agreements Mary Cook has requested that you attend a meeting tomorrow morning Tuesday October from to in EBC to discuss master netting agreements The directive Mary has presently been given is that we will be preparing various master netting agreements and she would like to solicit as much additional help as she can If the directive changes before the meeting tomorrow we will advise everyone Please review the below attachments prior to the meeting if your schedule allows Thanks Marie File Master Netting Security Agmnt gdoc File Master Netting Agreement Credit Support Annex cdoc File master netting issue listdoc File cwtdoc

FW Revisions to Enron Guaranty AgreementPlease make these revisions to the amendment to the guaranty Please create a redline and a clean version Thanks Harlan E Murphy Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith Street EB Houston Texas Tel Fax Email Harlan nroncom Original Message From ENRON Sent Monday November PM To Murphy Harlan Cc Subject Revisions to Enron Guaranty Agreement Har Im reviewing the attachment you sent earlier today regarding the security interest that was to be established under the Master Setoff Agreement Here are my revisions for the guaranty Enron provided to Dynegy If acceptable please incorporate these changes into the Amendment and have two original execution copies signed on behalf of Enron After execution on behalf of Enron please send them to me I will have them signed on behalf of Dynegy and I will return one fully executed original to you for Enrons files Please contact me with any questions or comments you may have Thanks Ernie See attached file Enron to Dyn Rev doc Enron to Dyn Rev doc

Paribas MNA AgreementsPlease prepare a cahrt that looks like this for the Paribas Agreements I really need a copy of the UK Physical Gas Agreement Thanks Harlan E Murphy Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith Street EB Houston Texas Tel Fax Email Harlan nroncom

FW EnronBNPP Master Netting Setoff and Security AgreementHarlan E Murphy Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith Street EB Houston Texas Tel Fax Email Harlan nroncom Original Message From David C Rosen ENRON Sent Monday November PM To Murphy Harlan Cc Seth GROSSHANDLER Subject EnronBNPP Master Netting Setoff and Security Agreement Dear Harlan The comments below are in addition to and should be read with the hand markup we faxed to you on Friday Notwithstanding that these comments remain subject to the resolution of the business issues we hope to close out as many outstanding items as possible to expedite the final execution of the agreement Please feel free to call me at if you have any questions Yours truly David Rosen Not yet admitted to the bar Temporary Location Information Cleary Gottlieb Steen Hamilton E rd Street Citigroup Center th Floor New York NY Phone Voicemail x Mobile Fax Email Replace Paragraph with This Master Netting Setoff and Security Agreement this Agreement is made and entered into effective as of November by and among BNP Paribas including all branches and agencies thereof BNPP BNP Paribas Commodity Futures Inc PFI and BNP Paribas Commodity Futures Limited BNPPCML and Enron Corp Enron Enron North America Corp ENA Enron Power Marketing Inc EPMI Enron Risk Management and Trading International Corp ERMTIC Enron Capital Trade Resources International Corp ECTRIC Enron Credit Limited ECL Enron Metals Limited EML and Enron Capital Trade Resources Limited ECTD Change definition of BNPP Party to means each of BNPP PFI and BNPPCML Change definition of Enron Party to means each of Enron ENA EPMI ECTRIC ERMTIC ECL EML and ECTD In the definition of Transaction insert before the word between i and add at the end the following or ii held at a contract market exchange board of trade or clearing organization by any Party on behalf of a member of the other Group pursuant to an Underlying Master Agreement In Section b in i replace the phrase all Transactions under one or more Underlying Master Agreements with each Transaction In Section b at the end of ii and v before the semicolon insert the following under any other agreement or under applicable law or equity whether in respect of the Transactions thereunder or otherwise In Section b at the end of iii after applicable law insert or equity In Section in the third sentence after the words from whom such payment is due insert the following to such Party or Parties as the Nondefaulting Group determines are entitled to such payment In Section b in each of the forth and the twelfth lines between the words hereby and grants insert except as provided in the next sentence and in each of the ninth and the sixteenth lines replace the text beginning Obligations until the end of each sentence with Obligations Without limiting the rights referred to in Section the security interest granted in the immediately preceding sentence shall not apply to the Final Settlement Amount At the beginning of Sections c and e insert the words Subject to Section In Section b following the words on the basis of a payment owed insert the words including margin With respect to Section our client has indicated that it would not be useful or efficient to have the issue of arbitration which is clearly not central to the risk reducing purposes of the arrangements mixed up with the proposed agreement which has arisen from the circumstances of Enron that have developed over the last few months BNP Paribas primary reason for not wanting to include an arbitration clause even with the suggested language changes is that although the concept of arbitration is being considered generally BNP Paribas has of yet not made any definitive decisions as to the implicit or necessary value of arbitration clauses and such a decision would require significant internal review and discussion Over the next few months further consideration can be given as to including arbitration in this agreement Please note that BNP Paribas contemplates at least one longform confirmation as an Underlying Master Agreement This message is being sent from a law firm and may contain information which is confidential or privileged If you are not the intended recipient please advise the sender immediately by reply email and delete this message and any attachments without retaining a copy
BNP Paribas AgreementHarlan E Murphy Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith Street EB Houston Texas Tel Fax Email Harlan nroncom

RE BNP Paribas Master Netting AgreementHere is a more current draft of the agreement Thanks for your assistance Harlan E Murphy Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith Street EB Houston Texas Tel Fax Email Harlan nroncom Original Message From Heard Marie Sent Monday November PM To Simons Paul Dawson Matthew Cooper Edmund Cc Evans Mark London Legal Murphy Harlan Subject BNP Paribas Master Netting Agreement Importance High Paul Matt and Edmund Attached is a copy of the Master Netting Agreement among BNP Paribas and Enron North America Corp et al It is imperative that this master netting agreement be executed as soon as possible tomorrow morning so I am asking your assistance in getting this document signed The UK entities to sign are EEFT Enron Capital Trade Resources Limited Enron Credit Limited and Enron Metals Limited Please leave the signature pages as set forth on the attached document as Enron Metals may be deleted from the agreement At this point we arent sure so we will have it sign on a separate page and then if they are not a party to the agreement we will omit their signature page Please take whatever steps are necessary to have the attached document signed ASAP Harlan Murphy is the lawyer here in Houston who prepared the document Please contact either Harlan Mary Cook Elizabeth Sager or Carol St Clair if you have any questions Bill Bradford is the Credit contact and his number is When the document is signed please fax the signature pages to me at MANY THANKS Marie Marie Heard Senior Legal Specialist Enron North America Corp Phone Fax File BNP PARBS MSTR NTTG doc

BNP Paribas Master Netting AgreementHere is the current draft of the Paribas Master Netting Agreement We intend to execute this this morning The entities and agreements may change prior to execution Contact me with any questions Harlan E Murphy Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith Street EB Houston Texas Tel Fax Email Harlan nroncom

BNP MNAPlease add and redline the applicable signature blocks for all of the entities in the attached and send it back to me Also please clean up the identifier and page number and put one of our identifiers in the agreement Thanks Harlan E Murphy Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith Street EB Houston Texas Tel Fax Email Harlan nroncom

Paribas MNA Interim Draft of xaffiliate netting agreementHarlan E Murphy Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith Street EB Houston Texas Tel Fax Email Harlan nroncom Original Message From David C Rosen ENRON Sent Tuesday November PM To Murphy Harlan Cook Mary Cc Edward J ROSEN Penny Christophorou Subject Interim Draft of xaffiliate netting agreement Ladies and Gentlemen I have attached a clean version of the Master Netting Setoff and Security Agreement a cumulative redline against the draft distributed by Harlan last night and an incremental redline again my earlier distribution reflecting BNP Paribas additional comments as well as our call Yours truly David Rosen Not yet admitted to the bar Temporary Location Information Cleary Gottlieb Steen Hamilton E rd Street Citigroup Center th Floor New York NY Phone Voicemail x Mobile Fax Email See attached file incremental redlinedocSee attached file Cumulative redlinedocSee attached file XAffil Netting Agreement vdoc This message is being sent from a law firm and may contain information which is confidential or privileged If you are not the intended recipient please advise the sender immediately by reply email and delete this message and any attachments without retaining a copy incremental redlinedoc Cumulative redlinedoc XAffil Netting Agreement vdoc

RE Master Netting Agreement AssignmentsPlease put me down for Calpine as well I was working on this before this process was developed Thanks Harlan E Murphy Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith Street EB Houston Texas Tel Fax Email Harlan nroncom Original Message From Heard Marie Sent Thursday November AM To Aronowitz Alan Clark Morris Davis Angela Del vecchio Peter Douglas Stephen H Evans Mark London Legal Gray Barbara N Hansen Leslie Heard Marie Hendry Brent Hodge Jeffrey T Jones Tana Keohane Peter Koehler Anne C Lech Kalembka Email Leite Francisco Pinto McCullough Travis Mellencamp Lisa Murphy Harlan Murray Julia Nemec Gerald Portz David Rick Antonoff Email Rohauer Tanya Sager Elizabeth Sayre Frank Shackleton Sara Simons Paul St Clair Carol Van Hooser Steve Viverito John Williams Jason R Credit Cc Cook Mary Subject Master Netting Agreement Assignments Attached is the updated list File MASTER NETTING AGREEMENT ASSIGNMENTSdoc

Dynegy Calpine Entities to be Covered by Master Netting Agreements Cc Dynegy Dynegy Canada Inc Dynegy Coal Trading and Transportation LLC Dynegy Global Liquids Inc Dynegy Inc Dynegy Marketing and Trade Dynegy Midstream Services Limited PArtnership Dynegy Power Marketing Inc Dynegy UK Limited Calpine Sheridan Energy Inc Calpine Energy Services LP DEI Texas Inc Calpine Fuels Texas Corporation Calpine Natural Gas Company CPN Gas Marketing Company Calpine Power Services Company Harlan E Murphy Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith Street EB Houston Texas Tel Fax Email Harlan nroncom Original Message From Farrell Keegan On Behalf Of Gray Barbara N Sent Friday November PM To Hansen Leslie Murphy Harlan Van Hooser Steve Sayre Frank Hendry Brent Davis Angela Portz David Viverito John Leite Francisco Pinto St Clair Carol Del vecchio Peter Cc Reeves Leslie Herron Chris Cook Mary Ephross Joel Subject Master Netting Agreement AssignmentsIdentification of legal entities comprising your assigned houses Based on the latest Master Netting Agreement Assignment List you are assigned to one or more houses to prepare a Master Netting Agreement I am currently working on excising natural gas receivables from an existing gas receivable facility known as the SweeP Receivables Facility This excisement is a prerequisite to our actual execution of the various Master Netting Agreements on which you are working In order for me to accomplish the excisement I need to create a list of each of the nonEnron legal entities which will be parties to the Master Netting Agreement you have been assigned The legal entities are needed so that we may assure that none of these legal entities will have its payables to ENA transferred to SweeP The final submission of receivables is due on Monday November th The list I am requesting from you will allow Leslie Reeves to excise your complete house from the submission of receivables I know that each of you are swamped but this excisement is a prerequisite to the execution of the Master Netting Agreements Even if you have only a rough list of the entities in your house please provide your best available information to me via email copying the CCs listed on this email Thank you for your assistance Best Regards BNG

FW Dynegy Calpine Entities to be Covered by Master Netting Agreements Cc Harlan E Murphy Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith Street EB Houston Texas Tel Fax Email Harlan nroncom Original Message From Radous Paul Sent Friday November PM To Murphy Harlan Cc Williams Jason R Credit Subject RE Dynegy Calpine Entities to be Covered by Master Netting Agreements Harlan With respect to the Calpine agreement please remove the following entities as we neither have outstanding transactions nor do we anticipate having any Sheridan Energy Inc DEI Texas Inc CPN Gas Marketing Company Calpine Power Services Company A further note on Calpine Power Services Company effective it was merged into Calpine Energy Services LP With Calpine the Enron entities that should be covered are EPMI and ENA Dynegy UK should probably come off since we are only netting US and Canada exposures Add Dynegy Coal Trading Transportation LLC if we want coal covered Enron entities should include EGLI ECC ERAC EPMI ENA ENA Upstream Co LLC EES Enron Coal Services Ltd Original Message From Murphy Harlan Sent Friday November PM To Gray Barbara N Reeves Leslie Herron Chris Cook Mary Ephross Joel Cc Heard Marie Radous FW Revised Master AgreementHarlan E Murphy Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith Street EB Houston Texas Tel Fax Email Harlan nroncom Original Message From ENRON Sent Thursday November PM To Murphy Harlan Subject Revised Master Agreement Har At long last attached please find the revised agreement in redline and in final My instructions were to prepare execution copies have them signed on behalf of the various Dynegy entities and they are being hand delivered to Mr Bradford in your credit group for execution on behalf of the various Enron entities I also prepared guaranty agreements from Dynegy Holdings and from Enron Corp each of which has been either executed or acknowledged on behalf of Dynegy The decision upstairs was that this final version was take it or leave it for Enron A summary of the major changes All margining language and references to Collateral were removed All operating Underlying Master Agreements were included The Group payment concept was eliminated in Section because it was not clear who would actually be making the payment Thanks Ernie See attached file Enron Mstr Net docSee attached file Enron Mstr Net Finaldoc Enron Mstr Net doc Enron Mstr Net Finaldoc

Revised Dynegy Master Netting AgreementHarlan E Murphy Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith Street EB Houston Texas Tel Fax Email Harlan nroncom Original Message From ENRON Sent Friday November PM To Murphy Harlan Cc Subject Revised Agreements Importance High Har As requested I have attached the agreements in redline and in final I am turning my attention to the Guaranty Agreements Not to beat a dead horse and as John also mentioned we will not accept changes to this Master Agreement that alter the terms and conditions of the Underlying Master Agreements At a later date we will be happy to negotiate in good faith concerning whether it would be mutually agreeable to amend those Underlying Master Agreements This Master Setoff Agreement is simply not the vehicle in which to accomplish that goal Regarding any concerns that this Master Agreement may not be enforceable in Europe or because it covers various Underlying Master Agreements for deals in Europe please note that Section provides severability language that should operate to carve out the European agreements that might otherwise create enforceability problems Therefore our approach has been to include them since your colleagues have acknowledged that they do not know whether there would be enforceability problems in Europe I look forward to discussing this final document with you at your earliest convenience I will be seeking signatures from Pryor at Thanks Ernie See attached file Enron Mstr Net RedlinedocSee attached file Enron Mstr Net Finaldoc Enron Mstr Net Redlinedoc Enron Mstr Net Finaldoc

Revised DynegyEnron Master Netting AgreementPlease contact me with any comments at your earliest convenieince Thanks Harlan E Murphy Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith Street EB Houston Texas Tel Fax Email Harlan nroncom Original Message From ENRON Sent Friday November PM To Murphy Harlan Cc Subject Revised Agreements Importance High Har As requested I have attached the agreements in redline and in final I am turning my attention to the Guaranty Agreements Not to beat a dead horse and as John also mentioned we will not accept changes to this Master Agreement that alter the terms and conditions of the Underlying Master Agreements At a later date we will be happy to negotiate in good faith concerning whether it would be mutually agreeable to amend those Underlying Master Agreements This Master Setoff Agreement is simply not the vehicle in which to accomplish that goal Regarding any concerns that this Master Agreement may not be enforceable in Europe or because it covers various Underlying Master Agreements for deals in Europe please note that Section provides severability language that should operate to carve out the European agreements that might otherwise create enforceability problems Therefore our approach has been to include them since your colleagues have acknowledged that they do not know whether there would be enforceability problems in Europe I look forward to discussing this final document with you at your earliest convenience I will be seeking signatures from Pryor at Thanks Ernie See attached file Enron Mstr Net RedlinedocSee attached file Enron Mstr Net Finaldoc Enron Mstr Net Redlinedoc File Enron Mstr Net Redlinedoc Enron Mstr Net Finaldoc File Enron Mstr Net Finaldoc

FW BNPPEnron Master Netting Setoff and Security AgreementHarlan E Murphy Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith Street EB Houston Texas Tel Fax Email Harlan nroncom Original Message From Rohauer Tanya Sent Tuesday November PM To Murphy Harlan Cc Schneider Chip St Clair Carol Subject FW BNPPEnron Master Netting Setoff and Security Agreement Transactions to be included ENA BNPP ISDA ECTRICBNPP ISDA ECLBNPP ISDA ECTDBNPP physical UK gas business Bill does not want to include any of the brokerage agreeements Also I beleive we have kept Metals out of everyhting thus far and should continue to do so One point of note in the document is section BNPP appears to have modified the language such that the Non Defaulting party can cherry pick which agreements it wants to terminate this is unacceptable To be honest I am going to need your help walking me through this document as they have changed so much I am unclear in many instances what their changes accomplish Please advise Thanks Tanya Original Message From Murphy Harlan Sent Monday November AM To Rohauer Tanya Subject FW BNPPEnron Master Netting Setoff and Security Agreement Harlan E Murphy Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith Street EB and I may be reached at Yours truly David Rosen Not yet admitted to the bar Temporary Location Information Cleary Gottlieb Steen Hamilton E rd Street Citigroup Center th Floor New York NY Phone Home BNP ParibasEnron Master Netting Agreement Cc The events in the Underlying Master Agreements that should be excluded from the definition of an event of default that would trigger an Underlying Master Agreements CloseOut are as follows i the unexcused failure of a party to deliver a specified quantity of a commodity ii a change in the extent to which a party is regulated and iii events described in Section f Default under Relevant Transaction and g Material Adverse Change of the GTC for the sale and purchase for Flat UK Beach Trades In addition all third party debt cross default thresholds in the UMAs should be revised to be Also please incorporate the language regarding the Commodity Exchange Act provided in the email attached below Please forward a copy of the draft to me Lech and all of the addresses ccd above Thanks Harlan E Murphy Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith Street EB Houston Texas Tel Fax Email Harlan nroncom Original Message From Lech Kalembka ENRON Sent Tuesday November PM To Cook Mary Murphy Harlan Cc David Mitchell Subject BNP Regarding the commodity law issue we suggest the following language The rights of the Parties under Sections and of this Agreement are subject to and qualified by the applicable provisions of the Commodity Exchange Act USC Sec et seq and the rules and regulations thereunder This could be new section or perhaps folded into existing boilerplate Please let me know if you have any questions or comments Lech Kalembka Cadwalader Wickersham Taft Maiden Lane New York NY Tel Fax Email NOTE The information in this email is confidential and may be legally privileged If you are not the intended recipient you must not read use or disseminate the information Although this email and any attachments are believed to be free of any virus or other defect that might affect any computer system into which it is received and opened it is the responsibility of the recipient to ensure that it is virus free and no responsibility is accepted by Cadwalader Wickersham Taft for any loss or damage arising in any way from its use
